A predatory eagle once planned an invasion. A vicious cow then thought "A marauder like me needs an invader like this for my invasions."
"The best invaders are overconfident invaders," thought the vicious cow So the cow decided to perform the invasion of the predatory eagle

What if a ðŸ¿, who was so aristocratic that it became a duke, subjugated a ðŸ¹ who was so lowly that it became a serf? #Duke=#Serf
The ðŸ¿ would tolerate no dissent from anyone. ðŸ¿ðŸ¤ðŸ‘ðŸ¹ (or: ðŸ¿ subjugated ðŸ¹) So at first, the aristocratic ðŸ¿ made the lowly ðŸ¹ its bitch.
ðŸ¿ðŸ’¬ðŸ¹ðŸ’‚ðŸ’¯ (or: ðŸ¿ was obeyed by ðŸ¹) So the ðŸ¹ pledged obedience to the ðŸ¿.
ðŸ¿ðŸ“¢ðŸ¤ðŸ¹ (or: ðŸ¿ ruled over ðŸ¹) Then the ðŸ¿ set the rules and the ðŸ¹ obeyed them.
ðŸ¿ðŸ˜¨ðŸ‘ðŸ•¹ðŸ¹ðŸ†“ (or: ðŸ¿ lost control over ðŸ¹) But the ðŸ¿ could no longer call the ðŸ¹'s tune.
ðŸ¹ðŸ˜ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜ðŸ˜¤ðŸ–ðŸ†“ðŸ¿ (or: ðŸ¿ was resisted by ðŸ¹) So the ðŸ¹ showed only defiance to the ðŸ¿.
ðŸ¹âž¡ðŸ¿ðŸ˜¡ (or: ðŸ¹ angered ðŸ¿) But the ðŸ¹ made the ðŸ¿ go red with anger. ðŸ¿1âƒ£ðŸ†š0âƒ£ðŸ¹ (or: ðŸ¿ defeated ðŸ¹) Then the ðŸ¿ defeated the ðŸ¹ utterly.
ðŸ¿ðŸ’ðŸ˜…ðŸ¹ (or: ðŸ¹ curried favor with ðŸ¿) But the ðŸ¹ assiduously curried favor with the ðŸ¿.
ðŸ¹ðŸ˜ˆðŸ’°ðŸ‘‰ðŸ¿ðŸµðŸ”€ðŸ™ˆðŸ™‰ (or: ðŸ¿ was bought off by ðŸ¹) In the end, the lowly ðŸ¹ bribed the aristocratic ðŸ¿ to play along.
Thereafter the ðŸ¿'s soul belonged entirely to the ðŸ¹ and it would never again belong to its rightful owner. The End
